Kansas_City.Truman Medical Center-Hospital Hill:
Truman Medical Center–Hospital Hill (abbreviated TMC Hospital Hill) is an acute care and outpatient hospital located in Kansas City, Missouri at 2301 Holmes Street.


== Hospital background ==
TMC Hospital Hill has the busiest adult emergency room in the Kansas City metropolitan area with more than 60,000 visits a year. It is located in Downtown Kansas City, Missouri across from Children's Mercy Hospital.
